String.name: Belly-Flop
String.tooltip: Leap forward onto your enemies, inflicting terrific damage, and slowing targets.

String.name: Spank
String.tooltip: Attack enemies three times, and continue to deal damage for a few seconds afterward.

String.name: Major Tantrum
String.tooltip: Shoot spheres of critical energy in an arc in front of you, stunning targets.

String.name: Big Belch
String.tooltip: Breathe fire in an arc in front of you, blasting yourself backward.

String.name: Jump Back
String.tooltip: Lets you jump backward and attack enemies in a set range.

String.name: Flying Fists
String.tooltip: Shoot rocket punches in multiple directions around you, slowing targets.

String.name: Purify Kumas
String.tooltip: Eliminate all the harmful effects cast on friendly kumases in the skill's range.

String.name: Heal Kumas
String.tooltip: Restore HP for other kumases in range.

String.name: Belly-Flop
String.tooltip: Leap onto your enemies, inflicting terrific damage, and slowing targets.

String.name: Tantrum
String.tooltip: Shoot two energy spheres in a small arc in front of you, stunning targets.

String.name: Belch
String.tooltip: Breathe fire in an arc in front of you.

String.name: Roundhouse Left
String.tooltip: Deliver a roundhouse punch while turning clockwise.

String.name: Roundhouse Right
String.tooltip: Deliver a roundhouse punch while turning counterclockwise.

String.name: Belly-Roll
String.tooltip: Attack as you roll forward, slowing the targets you roll over.

String.name: Purify Kumas
String.tooltip: Eliminate all the harmful effects cast on friendly kumases in the skill's range.

String.name: Backward Roll
String.tooltip: Attack as you roll backward, slowing the targets you roll over

String.name: Spank
String.tooltip: Attack enemies three times, and continue to deal damage for a few seconds afterward.
